original_text: I thought that my son here was dead. But now he has returned to me and he is alive! I thought that he had left me for all time. But now he has come home.” Then they all began to be happy together.
korean_text: 이 내 아들은 죽었다가 다시 살아났으며 내가 잃었다가 다시 얻었노라 하니 그들이 즐거워하더라

sentences.original_text: I thought that my son here was dead
But now he has returned to me
I thought that he had left me for all time
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그가 영원히 나를 떠났다고 생각했었다

sentences.original_text: But now he has come home
Then they all began to be happy together
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그들 모두 함께 기쁨을 느끼기 시작했다
